# Eva Gorobets Photography â€” Full LLM Reference

## Identity
Eva Gorobets is an Australian portrait and corporate photographer based in Tokyo, with deep working ties to Melbourne.

## Service Scope
1) Executive and business portraits
- Leadership headshots
- Founder portraits
- Team portrait sessions
- Studio and on-location options

2) Corporate event photography
- Conferences and forums
- Internal events and all-hands
- Product and partner events
- Delivery sets for PR, web, and social

3) Art and gallery photography
- Vernissages and exhibition openings
- Artist and curator portraits
- Artwork documentation
- Talks, lectures, and cultural programs

## Typical Clients
- International companies with Tokyo offices
- Corporate communications and PR teams
- Galleries, museums, curators, and artists

## Operational Notes
- Communication: English, Japanese, Russian
- NDA: available before briefing
- Invoicing: JPY, AUD, USD
- Typical first response: within 24 hours

## Locations
- Primary: Tokyo, Japan
- Frequent: Melbourne, Australia
- Also: international assignments by arrangement

## Main Public Pages
- Home: /en
- Corporate overview: /en/corporate
- Business portraits: /en/tokyo-business-portraits
- Corporate events: /en/corporate-events-photography
- Art and galleries: /en/art-galleries-photography
- Clients: /en/clients
- About: /en/about
- Contact form: /en/contact-booking
- Journal: /en/blog

## Language Variants
- English prefix: /en
- Japanese prefix: /jp
- Russian prefix: /ru

## Contact
- Email: eva@artflaneur.com.au
- Contact form: /en/contact-booking
